lyrics.text:
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘ofa,
‘A e ‘Afiona;
Ki he kakai angahala,
‘Oku loto feinga.

‘Oku po’ulia,
Hoku Laumālie;
‘Oku ‘ikai te u ‘iloa,
‘A hoku ‘Otua.

‘Oku ou mamahi,
Pea u manavahē,
‘I he’eku angakovi,
Mo e talangata’a.

‘Eiki anga’ofa,
Ke ke ako’i au;
Mo ke fakamolemole,
‘Eku angahala.

Pea u toki ‘ilo
‘A hoku ‘Otua,
‘I he fakahā mo’oni,
‘E he ‘Afiona.
